TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationSection Inherits ConfigurationElement

span.span: Represents a section within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 类实现自定义节类型。You use the class to implement a custom section type. 扩展 类，以提供自定义处理和编程访问自定义配置节。Extend the class to provide custom handling and programmatic access to custom configuration sections. 有关如何使用自定义配置节的信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 ConfigurationSection 创建自定义配置节](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2tw134k3(v=vs.100))。For information about how use custom configuration sections, see [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2tw134k3(v=vs.100)). 节向元素中的条目注册其处理类型 `configSections` 。A section registers its handling type with an entry in the `configSections` element. 有关示例，请参阅示例部分中所示的配置文件摘录。For an example, see the configuration file excerpt shown in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，配置节处理程序用于以编程方式更改配置设置。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, configuration section handlers were used to make changes to configuration settings programmatically. 现在，所有默认配置节均由扩展类的类表示 。Now, all the default configuration sections are represented by classes that extend the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式实现自定义节。The following example shows how to implement a custom section programmatically. 有关演示如何实现和使用通过特性化模型实现的自定义部分的完整示例，请参见 。For a complete example that shows how to implement and use a custom section implemented using the attributed model, see . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#1)] 下面的示例是配置文件的摘录，因为它适用于前面的示例。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file as it applies to the previous example. ```xml
```

para.span: 您可以使用编程方式或声明性 (特性化) 编码模型来创建自定义配置节：

span.span: You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create custom configuration sections:

para.span: -编程模型。

span.span: - Programmatic model.

para.span: 此模型要求为每个节属性创建一个属性以获取或设置其值，并将其添加到基础基类的内部属性包 。

span.span: This model requires that for each section attribute you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.

para.span: -声明性模型。

span.span: - Declarative model.

para.span: 这种简单的模型（也称为特性化模型）允许您通过使用属性来定义节特性并使用特性修饰它。

span.span: This simpler model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define a section attribute by using a property and decorating it with attributes.

para.span: 这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关属性类型及其默认值的信息。

span.span: These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.

para.span: 通过反射获取此信息后，ASP.NET 配置系统将创建节属性对象并执行所需的初始化。

span.span: With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the section property objects and performs the required initialization.

para.span: 类允许以编程方式访问配置文件。

span.span: The class allows programmatic access for editing configuration files.

para.span: 可以按如下所示访问这些文件以进行读取或写入：

span.span: You can access these files for reading or writing as follows:

para.span: 读取.

span.span: - Reading.

para.span: 你使用 或 来读取配置信息。

span.span: You use or to read configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，读取的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有父配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.

para.span: 如果你的应用程序需要对自己的配置进行只读访问，则建议你在使用 Web 应用程序的情况下使用重载的方法，或 在客户端应用程序的情况下使用方法。

span.span: If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended you use the overloaded methods in the case of Web applications, or the method in the case of client applications.

para.span: 这些方法提供对当前应用程序的缓存配置值的访问，该配置值具有比类更好的性能 。

span.span: These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.

para.span: 如果使用 采用参数的静态方法 ，则 参数必须引用运行代码的应用程序; 否则，将忽略该参数并返回当前正在运行的应用程序的配置信息。

span.span: If you use a static method that takes a parameter, the parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running; otherwise, the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently-running application is returned.

para.span: 书写.

span.span: - Writing.

para.span: 使用其中一种 方法来编写配置信息。

span.span: You use one of the methods to write configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，写入的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件和目录具有写入权限。

span.span: - Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the configuration files.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置 API 概述

span.span: ASP.NET Configuration API Overview

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 构造函数，需要先定义自定义节类型。To use the constructor, you need to define a custom section type first. 有关示例，请参阅 类概述。For an example see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following example shows how to use the constructor. 此示例假设您已创建了一个名为的自定义节类 `CustomSection` 。This example assumes that you have created a custom section class named `CustomSection`. 有关此类类的示例，请参阅 类概述。For an example of such a class, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#2)]

span.span: The object, which reads from the configuration file.
Reads XML from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反序列化是指从配置文件读取 XML 数据，将其转换为实时数据，并将其存储在对象中。Deserialization refers to the reading of XML data from a configuration file, its transformation into real-time data, and its storage in an object.

exception.span: 在配置文件中找不到元素。

span.span: found no elements in the configuration file.

summary.span: 在派生的类中重写时返回自定义对象。

span.span: Returns a custom object when overridden in a derived class.
The object representing the section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 运行时调用方法时，配置系统首先创建类的适当实例 ，然后返回它从方法获取的对象 。When the method is called at run time, the configuration system first creates an appropriate instance of the class, and then returns the object it obtains from the method. 默认情况下， 只返回表示从中调用该对象的对象 。By default, simply returns the object that represents the from which it is called. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#4)]

para.span: 您可以重写 方法，以便在运行时返回自定义类型。

span.span: You can override the method to return a custom type at run time.

para.span: 例如，若要限制运行时修改类中的设置 ，您可以重写 并返回一个自定义类型，该类型强制对可以修改哪些设置的限制（如果有）。

span.span: For example, to restrict runtime modification of the settings in the class, you can override and return a custom type that enforces restrictions on which settings can be modified, if any.

para.span: 如果运行时对象仅供内部使用，则返回的对象不能在定义它的程序集的外部使用。

span.span: If the runtime object is internal only, the returned object cannot be used outside the assembly that defines it.

para.span: 创建派生自的对象的一种方法， 只能在运行时由程序集中的代码访问：创建具有返回实现的方法的内部运行时对象 。

span.span: One way to create an object that derives from and can only be accessed by code in your assembly at run time is to create an internal runtime object that has a method that returns your implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化是指将对象中包含的实时数据转换为 XML 格式，并将其存储到配置文件。Serialization refers to the transformation of real-time data, contained in an object, to XML format and its storage to a configuration file.

summary.span: 指示在为 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的指定目标版本序列化配置对象层次结构时，是否应序列化指定元素。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified element should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

span.span: if the should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为及更高版本创建的每个配置节 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 必须显式重写此方法并返回 `true` ，但前提是指定的元素对于指定的版本有效 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 。Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the specified element is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 为的早期版本创建的现有配置节不必 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 更改。Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基类型包含此方法的默认实现，该实现始终返回 `true` 。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 如果实现配置节并且不重写此方法，则默认情况下，将为所有框架版本序列化配置节中包含的所有配置元素。If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default all configuration elements that are contained in the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为及更高版本创建的每个配置节 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 必须显式重写此方法并返回 `true` ，但前提是配置节对于的指定版本有效 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 。Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the configuration section is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 为的早期版本创建的现有配置节不必 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 更改。Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基类型包含此方法的默认实现，该实现始终返回 `true` 。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 如果实现配置节并且不重写此方法，则默认情况下，将为所有框架版本序列化配置节。If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects
